text:
Clawdbot is everywhere right now.

It lives in WhatsApp or Telegram. It remembers old chats. Sounds cool, but it needs full file and shell access. That feels risky.

Anyone using it for real? Is it helpful or annoying?
How expensive is Claude Opus?

Let’s see if Clawdbot (Moltbot) lives up to the hype.

Gonna share the step by step process here in thread

facts

clawdbot is doing a better job than some of my writers lol

not doing a better job than me yet though
Ok so Clawdbot is OP. I just had it make my standalone python drum utility app into a VST3 with all the functionality I had originally envisioned when I first set out to make it. I’m impressed.
¿Os acordáis de clawdbot, que luego le cambiaron el nombre a moltbot? ¡Qué tiempos aquellos! Hay que ver cómo pasa el tiempo, parece que fue ayer.

Clawdbot is an open-source AI agent that runs locally on your devices (like Mac or Windows), connecting to apps like Telegram or WhatsApp to automate tasks. It's gone viral for its privacy-focused, cloud-free approach, potentially disrupting traditional software ecosystems. Check
